name: In Real Life
description:
In Real Life

In Real Life is a digital point and click adventure game with logic puzzles. The game world takes place in an alternative reality of the 1930s, in which there has been a significant technological advancement. Most of the mechanical works are taken over by robots and automatic machines, which gains self-awareness over time. We play the role of household robot equipped with artificial intelligence, its goal is to get out of the apartment of its creator. Deisring freedom, the robot has to face numerous puzzles on its way that block the exit from the apartment.

IMPORTANT!

This is a demo, prototype project.

Unfortunately, the game currently has a translation only with Polish subtitles, we are planning to create a translation in English.

We are also working on adding sound effects to the game.
